title: Oozham (2016)
overview: It is the story of Surya (Prithviraj Sukumaran) and his revenge against his family's ill fate. Surya as the son of a health inspector Krishnamurthy (Balachandra Menon) had striven hard for his family and is working in the United States. He returns to the homeland for his sister's engagement. His sister is being killed A devastating incident takes place and with the aid of his gadget skills as well as his adopted brother(Neeraj Madhav) and his fiancee (Divya Pillai)whose brother was also killed,he sets out for revenge with the people who caused this in a spuriously dramatic and vengeful narrative.
storyline: After witnessing a tragic demise over a video call, Surya, a demolition expert decides to avenge their deaths. He finds support in his fiancé, Gayathri, who is mourning her brother's death.
